name: Wesness Move with Glow Bengaluru
description:
This 4.5K community run is all about moving together.
Designed at an easy, social pace, this run welcomes all fitness levels. Whether you’re a regular runner or just getting started, this one’s for the Glow Gang that shows up for movement, connection, and good energy.
We start with a group warm-up to get bodies ready, then head out on a relaxed city route where conversation flows as easily as the run. The session wraps up with a guided cool-down, so you leave feeling refreshed, reset, and fully in your glow.
No pressure on pace. No competition. Just a good run with good people.
Date: 15th Feb, Saturday
Location: Westside – Commercial Street → Ulsoor Lake → SUFC Turf
Time: 6:30am (reporting), 7am (flag off)
﻿
Let’s clock the vibes

name: WORLD WOMEN S DAY RUN 2026
description:
🌸 WORLD WOMEN’S DAY RUN 2026
Celebrate Strength • Celebrate Equality • Celebrate You! 🌸
Join us for an empowering morning as we come together to celebrate the spirit, strength, and unity of women at the World Women’s Day Run 2026!
Whether you're a passionate runner or stepping into your first race, this event is designed to inspire, energize, and uplift every individual.

name: Apollo Sugar & Dental Clinics, Jakkur Commitment Run 2026
description:
About the Event
If the Resolution Run was about starting, the Commitment Run is about staying - Staying consistent, Staying accountable, Staying true to the promise you made to yourself at the beginning of the year.
Set in the calm, energising surroundings of Jakkur Lake, this run invites you to show up—not for medals or timing chips, but for the habit you chose to build. Whether you walk, jog, or run, your presence is a statement: I’m still committed.
As one of four runs in the 
Apollo Sugar & Dental Clinics, Jakkur, Wellness Run Series
, the Commitment Run represents the second step in a year-long journey - where motivation turns into discipline, and intention begins to form lasting habits.
Organised by Apollo Sugar & Dental Clinics, Jakkur, the event brings together individuals, families, and communities who believe that real change comes from repeated effort, not one-day motivation.
Why Join Us?
The Apollo Commitment Run is thoughtfully crafted to deliver a complete, premium running experience. Every participant receives an exclusively designed finisher medal that honours consistency and effort, along with a high-quality event T-shirt built for comfort on race day and beyond. The course is carefully designed by runners themselves, ensuring a safe, intuitive, and enjoyable flow, with hydration stations placed every 800 metres to support a smooth, well-paced, and worry-free run.
Series Finisher Reward
As part of the 4-Run Apollo Sugar & Dental Clinics, Jakkur Wellness Series, participants who complete all four runs will earn a special composite finisher medal - 
the Soaring Eagle
, proudly presented by Apollo Sugar & Dental Clinics, Jakkur - a symbol of consistency, strength, and commitment across the year.
Event Highlights
 Friendly 1.6K, 3K, 5K & 7k routes suitable for all fitness levels
 Non-competitive, family-friendly format
 Guided warm-up and cool-down sessions
 Hydration support along the route
 Scenic neighbourhood course around Jakkur
 Start your year with a wellness milestone
Race Categories
Super 7K
Fun 5k
Step-up 3k
Movable Mile
Participant Perks
Exclusive Finisher Medal
Event T-shirt
Snack Box
Professional Event Photos
Hydration stations every 800 Mtrs
On-ground medical support by Apollo Sugar & Dental Clinics, Jakkur
Venue Details
Jakkur Lake
Parking will be available near the event venue.
BIB Collection
Registered participants can collect their Bibs at the 
Apollo Sugar & Dental Clinics, Jakkur
Event Requirements
 Open to all age groups
 Registration fees are non-refundable
 Participants must follow event rules and local regulations
 Respect the venue, volunteers, and fellow runners
This is more than a run - it’s a Commitment.
A Commitment to Choose Health
A Commitment to continue your fitness journey

name: Cubbon Classic 10K
description:
Cubbon Classic: BENGALURU'S own running classic.
The Cubbon Classic is Bengaluru's premier running celebration, blending the prestige of a world-class race with the city's iconic heritage. This event focuses exclusively on the signature 10K distance, run on an AIMS-certified course that weaves through the lush green heart of Cubbon Park. Join thousands to achieve a new personal best, earn the coveted Finisher's Medal, and compete for the prestigious CUBBON'S ULTIMATE RUNNING CLUB CHALLENGE . More than a race, it's a "habba"—a vibrant running festival celebrating fitness, friendship, and the enduring spirit of the Garden City!
 Podium & Age Group Prizes
Podium prizes will be awarded to the Top 3 male and female finishers in each of the following age groups:
16 - 20 years, 21 - 25 years, 26 - 30 years ...and so on, up to 76 - 80 years, 80+ years
Cubbon's Ultimate Running Club
Rules & Eligibility:
Eligibility: To be eligible, a team must have a minimum of 10 runners, consisting of at least 7 male runners and 3 female runners.
Scoring: The team's score will be the average net finish time of their best 7 male finishers and best 3 female finishers. The club with the best average time wins.
The Rolling Trophy: The winning club will be awarded a prestigious rolling trophy with their name engraved, cementing their legacy at the Cubbon Classic.
Registering Your Running Club for the Challenge
The Ultimate Running Club Challenge uses a simple two-step process to ensure all your members are correctly linked to your club:
Captain Registration: The Running Club Captain must first fill out the Club Registration Form in our website 
www.cubbonclassic.com
.
They will need to provide the following essential details:
Club Name, Club Captain Name, Captain's Email ID, Captain's Phone Number, Club Base City
Code Distribution: In 24-48hrs after submitting the form, the Club Captain will receive an email containing their unique Running Club Code. This code must be shared with all club members.
Member Entry: Each individual club member must enter this unique code into the dedicated "Running Club Code" field during their official 10K registration.
Only runners who use the unique code will be tracked and scored in the Ultimate Running Club Challenge.
All runners will receive:
1. Event T-shirt
2. Event Goodie Bag
3. Finisher Medal
4. Race BIB with Timing Chip
5. Post Race Refreshments
6. Personalised Event Pictures
7. Hydration On Route
8. Medical Support
9. Post Race Celebrations
10. Access to Story Telling Tent

name: Sarakki Lake Run
description:
BeAthlit Lake Run – Sarakki Edition 
Now Moving to Bangalore South | March 8th, 2026
BeAthlit Lake Run
 is a non-competitive community run that celebrates movement, nature, and togetherness—one lake at a time. With the Sarakki Lake Run, we’re excited to take this movement to Bangalore South, continuing our mission of reclaiming the city’s lakes as vibrant spaces for health and joy.
This edition is in collaboration with 
ODUBA RUN Club
 and will be hosted at one of South Bengaluru’s most cherished green spaces — Sarakki Lake — on March 8th, 2026.
Whether you’re a first-time runner, a casual walker, or a seasoned jogger, this is your space.
No timing chips.
No pressure.
No podium.
Just a supportive community that moves together.
Run in Celebration of Women
This International Women’s Day, we celebrate strength, resilience, and freedom of movement.
We run to honour women who show up for themselves, their families, and their communities—every single day.
Come run for yourself, with your friends, with your daughters, mothers, and sisters.
Why Bangalore South?
Bangalore South is home to some of the city’s most active neighborhoods and community-driven wellness initiatives. By bringing the Lake Run to Sarakki Lake, we aim to:
Build stronger local running and walking communities
Encourage everyday movement close to home
Celebrate and activate one of South Bengaluru’s important public green spaces
Why Join Us?
Move your body and clear your mind
Run with a community that cheers, not competes
Start your Sunday with sunrise, smiles, and sweat
Reclaim our lakes as vibrant public spaces for health and joy
Event Highlights
Friendly 3K & 5K routes around scenic Sarakki Lake
Open to all ages and fitness levels
Guided warm-up & cool-down stretches by community trainers
Refreshments & water stations
Hosted in collaboration with 
ODUBA Club
Run 10 Lake Runs and earn the title: Legend of the Lakes
Awards
Top 3 runners with the best costumes will be awarded
Creativity, spirit, and fun matter — come dressed to impress!
Venue Details
Sarakki Lake
, Bengaluru (Bangalore South)
Date: March 8th, 2026
Race Categories:
3K – Non-timed
5K – Non-timed
Participant Perks
Exclusive Finisher Medal
On-ground event photos & videos
Hydration points every 700 Mtrs
Event T-shirt
Snack Box
Event Requirements
Open to all participants
Registration fees are non-refundable
Participants must comply with all city, state, and public health regulations
Familiarity with and adherence to event rules is mandatory
More Than a Run — It’s a Movement
From North to South, lake by lake,
we’re building a healthier, more active Bengaluru.
Take control. Be intentional.
Join us in Bangalore South and be part of something bigger.
Registrations are now open
Sign up and run with purpose.

address.streetAddress: Sarakki Lake, 11th Cross, K.R Layout, Puttenahalli Rd, JP Nagar 6th Phase, MG Layout, JP Nagar Phase 6, J. P. Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560078, India
